title-group.article-title: ALGEBRAIC ENTROPY, AUTOMORPHISMS AND SPARSITY OF ALGEBRAIC DYNAMICAL SYSTEMS AND PSEUDORANDOM NUMBER GENERATORS

abstract.p: We present several general results that show how algebraic dynamical systems with a slow degree growth and also rational automorphisms can be used to construct stronger pseudorandom number generators. We then give several concrete constructions that illustrate the applicability of these general results.
